title: Slut Breeding
description: Alex will do anything for Stan, but if she wants her parents to keep paying her college tuition then no one can ever know that they're together. Too bad someone does, and if they give him what he wants then he'll keep quiet. He wants to watch Stan breed Alex. Alex doesn't want to be bred, but now she has to make a choice. How far will she go?Slut Breeding is 4,000 words.** WARNING ** This story contains voyeurism, breeding, and dubcon.
author: Lexis Sommer
